overview: Performed by Constance Smith, Pauline Cushman-Fryer tells us how she became a Union Spy, got caught and was almost hanged, why Abraham Lincoln granted her the rank of Major, and how she died lonely in San Francisco from an overdose of opium.
tagline: Pauline Cushman played the role of a lifetime, but first, she had to get kicked
title: Brevet Major Pauline Cushman-Fryer
